scripts.compile:legacy: npm run compile:legacy:1.3 && npm run compile:legacy:1.6
scripts.compile:infrastructure: npm run compile:infrastructure_0.5 && npm run compile:infrastructure_0.6

scripts.compile: npm run compile:infrastructure && npm run compile:modules && npm run compile:wallet

scripts.lint:contracts: npx solhint contracts/**/*.sol && npx solhint contracts/**/**/*.sol

scripts.security:slither:infrastructure_0.6: rm -rf build && npm run compile:infrastructure_0.6 && slither .
scripts.security:slither:modules: rm -rf build && npx truffle compile --config truffle-config-modules.js && slither .
scripts.security:slither:wallet: rm -rf build && npm run compile:wallet && slither .
scripts.security:slither:infrastructure_0.5:tria: rm -rf build && npm run compile:infrastructure_0.5 && slither . --triage-mode
scripts.security:slither:infrastructure_0.6:tria: rm -rf build && npm run compile:infrastructure_0.6 && slither . --triage-mode
scripts.security:slither:modules:triage: rm -rf build && npx truffle compile --config truffle-config-modules.js && slither . --triage-mode
scripts.security:slither:wallet:triage: rm -rf build && npm run compile:wallet && slither . --triage-mode
